name: From A to A
description:
There is a fish that has special and true love story under the water. It named, Ninespine stickleback. Female Ninespine stickleback leave male fish alone after lay eggs. Therefore male fish has to care about the eggs all by himself.  Male fish doesn't eat and sleep until the eggs are hatched. Normally, It takes 8 to 15 days. He is willing to fight against other creatures which want to eat his eggs. 

Eat or be eaten, survive from the nature.

Key features

  • The fish is protecting his eggs.
  • The hungry Crab has to eat the eggs to survive.

It will be free to play.

Release date: 2017-06-23

Contact detail: zxcvb2994@gmail.com

by: Taeyang Han
